From: "Markus.Mirsberger" <markus.mirsberger@...>

Hi,


I am trying to set up and debug Heritrix in Eclipse (Luna).
Setting up the project is not the problem. I cloned the git master, ran 
the mvn install and imported the project into Eclipse.
But now I have a Maven project and I am not able to run and debug it as 
a Java project.

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+in+Eclipse

This howto does not work as soon as it comes to the point "import into 
eclipse" because its not possible to import the project as anything else 
as a Maven project and if I do that I can't debug it as a Java Application.

Did I miss anything? .... Any ideas how I can get this running?:)

Thanks,
Markus
